product_name: Aqua Sphere Seal Kid Swim Goggles - Kids'
long_description: Aqua Sphere Seal Kid swim goggles are ideal for children or adults with small faces. The flexible frame, watertight fit and easy-adjust buckles offer great performance and comfort. Softeril(R) silicone material is pliable and durable, and retains its flexibility and shape over time. Clear, 180deg lenses provide great visibility for swimming indoors or in low light. Plexisol(R) lens material offers 100% UVA and UVB protection and a scratch-resistant coating.
short_description: Aqua Sphere Seal Kid swim goggles are ideal for children or adults with small faces. The flexible frame, watertight fit and easy-adjust buckles offer great performance and comfort.
